description: Test mnemonic phrases for deterministic testing
warning: NEVER use these mnemonics for real funds - they are public test vectors

testCases.name: standard_test_mnemonic
testCases.mnemonic: abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon abandon about
testCases.purpose: Standard BIP39 test vector, used for cross-platform validation

testCases.name: alice_test_mnemonic
testCases.mnemonic: zoo zoo zoo zoo zoo zoo zoo zoo zoo zoo zoo wrong
testCases.purpose: Alice test account for E2E transfer tests

testCases.name: bob_test_mnemonic

testCases.purpose: Bob test account for E2E transfer tests

testCases.name: random_test_1
testCases.mnemonic: void come effort suffer camp survey warrior heavy shoot primary clutch crush open amazing screen patrol group space point ten exist slush involve unfold
testCases.purpose: 24-word test mnemonic for additional entropy tests
